label: Incident Response Plan Adherence
quote: In the event of an incident, the contractor facility SOC shall adhere to the incident response plan.

label: Provide CIRT Services
quote: The Contractor shall provide Computer Incident Response Team (CIRT) services.

label: Incident Reporting Process Compliance
quote: The contractor shall adhere to the standard Incident Reporting process as determined by the Component and is defined by a DHS-specific incident response plan that adheres to DHS policy and procedure for reporting incidents.

label: Conduct Incident Response Exercises
quote: The contractor shall conduct Incident Response Exercises to ensure all personnel are familiar with the plan.

label: Incident Notification and Collaboration
quote: The contractor shall notify the DHS SOC of any incident in accordance with the Incident Response Plan and work with DHS throughout the incident duration.

label: Firewall Management Services
quote: The Contractor shall provide firewall management services that include the design, configuration, implementation, maintenance, and operation of all firewalls within the hosted DHS infrastructure in accordance with DHS architecture and security policy.

label: Firewall Maintenance and Configuration
quote: The contractor shall provide all maintenance to include configuration, patching, rule maintenance (add, modify, delete), and comply with DHSâ€™ configuration management / release management requirements when changes are required.

label: Firewall 24x7x365 Operation
quote: Firewalls shall operate 24x7x365.

label: Firewall Log Analysis Reporting
quote: Analysis of the firewall logs shall be reported to DHS COTR in weekly status reports.

label: Firewall Anomaly Notification
quote: If an abnormality or anomaly is identified, the contractor shall notify the appropriate DHS point of contact in accordance with the incident response plan.

label: NIDS Sensor and Hardware Management
quote: The Contractor shall provide the design, configuration, implementation, and maintenance of the sensors and hardware that are required to support the NIDS solution.

label: NIDS Rule Set Management
quote: The contractor is responsible for creating and maintaining the NIDS rule sets.

label: NIDS Real-Time Alerts
quote: The NIDS solution should provide real-time alerts.

label: Central Repository for NIDS Alerts
quote: These alerts and other relevant information shall be located in a central repository.

label: NIDS 24x7x365 Operation
quote: The NIDS shall operate 24x7x365.

label: NIDS Alert Summary Reporting
quote: A summary of alerts shall be reported to DHS COTR in weekly status reports.

label: NIDS Anomaly Notification
quote: If an abnormality or anomaly is identified, the contractor shall notify the appropriate DHS point of contact in accordance with the incident response plan.

label: Facility Physical Security Measures
quote: The Contractor shall provide a facility using appropriate protective measures to provide for physical security.
section: Physical and Information Security and Monitoring

label: Facility Location Eligibility
quote: The facility will be located within the United States and its territories.
section: Physical and Information Security and Monitoring

label: Physical Access Control Process
quote: The contractor shall maintain a process to control physical access to DHS IT assets.
section: Physical and Information Security and Monitoring

label: 24x7x365 Monitoring of DHS IT Assets
quote: DHS IT Assets shall be monitored 24x7x365.
section: Physical and Information Security and Monitoring

label: Unauthorized Access Attempt Reporting
quote: A summary of unauthorized access attempts shall be reported to the appropriate DHS security office.
section: Physical and Information Security and Monitoring

label: Provide 24x7x365 SOC Staff for Monitoring
quote: The SOC personnel shall provide 24x7x365 staff to monitor the network and all of its devices.

label: Analyze Device Info for Security Events & Monitoring
quote: The contractor staff shall also analyze the information generated by the devices for security events, respond to real-time events, correlate security device events, and perform continuous monitoring.

label: Maintain Trouble Ticket System for Incidents
quote: It is recommended that the contractor staff shall also maintain a trouble ticket system in which incidents and outages are recorded.
